Provides Role-Specific Interfaces: It offers tailored user interfaces for three distinct roles: Customers: Can submit new demands (including specialized ones like acacia pole orders) and track their existing demands, benefiting from AI suggestions for alternatives or status explanations. Manufacturers: Can list new stock items, manage their inventory, and leverage AI tools for price suggestions, marketing text generation, product photo generation, and listing quality analysis. Administrators: Have a comprehensive overview of the platform, manage users and system-wide stock, utilize advanced AI-driven matchmaking tools, plan logistics (including truck loading and routing), handle billing, and access AI-generated reports and system health dashboards. Features Smart Logistics & Planning: One of its standout features is AI-driven logistics organization. This includes: Matchmaking: AI suggests optimal pairings between customer demands and manufacturer stock. Truck Planning: AI can generate optimal loading plans for trucks (e.g., 24-ton capacity), considering multi-pickup and multi-drop-off scenarios to maximize efficiency. It also provides route suggestions and can draft communications for carriers. Cost Estimation: AI assists in estimating logistics costs. projects.title: CivicsHero
projects.description: Civics Hero is a Duolingo-style web app that turns U.S. citizenship preparation into a game. Many immigrants rely on paper flashcards or dry PDFs, which makes staying motivated—and spotting weak spots—difficult. I built Civics Hero after tutoring ESL classmates who dreaded the civics test; they needed bite-sized practice, instant feedback, and a sense of progress.  Who it’s for 	•	Green-card holders studying for the 2008 USCIS Civics Test 	•	ESL teachers who want an engaging homework tool 	•	Community organizations that help newcomers become citizens. Tech & integrations 	•	React + Vite front-end with Zustand state management 	•	Supabase for auth, JSONB question storage, and Edge Functions that grade answers in ~25 ms 	•	Recharts for accessibility-friendly heat-map analytics 	•	Netlify CI/CD for zero-ops deployment

projects.title: Waze but for Safety
projects.description: Birdzie is a lightweight app, meant for everyday life integration, that's crowdsourced safety data and a friend-like feel to better personal safety and higher situational awareness. If you've ever called a friend to stay on the phone you walked home, or sent a "made it!" text at midnight, you already know why Birdzie exists. For so many us, personal safety isn't just about emergencies, it's about just feeling comfortable in our normal, everday lives. I started Birdzie because I was frustrated by safety apps built by people who just didn't really get it from a woman's point of view, or really any marginalized-minority point of view. As a woman, a mom, a friend, and (I'd like to think) good person - I'm constantly thinking about my family, my friends, even just the people around me) and wanted to create a solution that felt human, supportive, lightweight, and easy enough to use everyday. Something I'd- we'd-want to use everyday.

projects.title: Native Heal
projects.description: 🌿 What is Native Heal? Native Heal is a digital platform built to connect patients with trusted traditional healers in a secure, convenient, and culturally respectful way.  🔍 What Problem Does It Solve? In many African communities, traditional healing is often the first point of care, but the experience is largely offline, fragmented, and built on word-of-mouth referrals. This creates issues like:  Difficulty finding credible healers  Lack of standard booking and communication channels  No visibility into healer expertise or reviews  No digital tools for healers to manage their practice  💡 What Inspired It? As someone deeply rooted in African heritage and passionate about health access, I saw how undervalued and unsupported traditional healers are in the digital world. Many operate informally through Facebook groups or WhatsApp. I wanted to build a trusted, empowering bridge between ancient wisdom and modern tech — honoring our traditions while giving healers tools to thrive.  👥 Who Is It For? Patients who want to safely find and consult with traditional healers.  Healers who want to grow their practice, reach more clients, and manage bookings professionally.  Cultural advocates who care about preserving indigenous knowledge.  🚀 Key Features 🔎 Search & Filter: Find healers by specialisation (e.g., fertility, child health, dream interpretation)  💬 Messaging: Patients and healers can chat securely in-app  📆 Bookings: Patients can request consultations (synchronous or scheduled)  ⭐ Ratings & Reviews: Build credibility through client feedback  🛍️ Healer Shop: Each healer can sell herbal products from their own mini-shop  📚 Healer Blogs & Events: Culturally rich content to engage and educate  🛠️ Admin Tools for Healers: Manage sessions, block off time, track clients  🔗 Google Calendar Sync: Automatically manage healer availability  🛡️ Verification & Approval: Platform verifies healer credentials for patient safety

projects.title: Lab2Life: Igniting Wonder Through Hands-On Science
projects.description: Lab2Life is a global hands-on science learning platform designed for school students who rarely experience real experiments. Inspired by a childhood science fair win and the harsh reality that most students in India (and worldwide) never get to feel science, Lab2Life brings monthly hands-on experiments to classrooms and homes — turning kids into scientists and parents into co-discoverers.  Built using Bolt, OpenAI, and Netlify, Lab2Life includes:  Experiment Passport (gamified global learning)  AI Lab Assistant (Beta) for science Q&A, built using OpenAI and soon to be powered offline with Gemma 3n  Family Ripple Effect — students replicate experiments at home with parents  Impact Tracker + Student Showcase to celebrate global creativity  Lab2Life solves the passive-learning problem and bridges the school-to-home science gap — especially for underserved schools. It’s built for Grades 3–12, but designed to spark lifelong curiosity.

projects.title: QR-Nexus
projects.description: This project is a customizable QR code generator for users seeking full control over their QR code’s design and functionality. Users can change dot shapes, colours, and even embed an image in the center, while keeping the QR code fully functional. It also includes a QR code decoder that scans any code, extracts the URL, and checks if the website is malicious. A personal dashboard that allows users to view and manage their previously generated QR codes, along with analytics showing how many scans occurred over the past week and month.

Nossa rádio nasceu com o propósito de explorar além da superfície sonora, oferecendo uma conexão com um universo de sons intensos e subversivos, onde a música ultrapassa o mero entretenimento e se transforma em uma expressão crua de cultura e resistência.  Aqui, celebramos o underground com notícias exclusivas, vídeos, lançamentos e tudo o que amplifica as vozes ignoradas pela mídia tradicional. Nosso lema, Explorando o lado mais obscuro da música, reflete a nossa missão de proporcionar uma experiência autêntica e profunda a quem vive e valoriza a cena alternativa.  Cada faixa e cada notícia fazem parte de uma comunidade que enxerga na música um poder transformador. Junte-se a nós nessa jornada! Conecte-se pelo Telegram, Skype ou envie um e-mail para contato@radio-b-c-underground.com.br com suas sugestões, histórias ou até suas próprias músicas. Estamos aqui para criar um espaço onde todos os amantes do verdadeiro som underground se sintam em casa.

projects.title: Blood-Donation-Management
projects.description: BloodConnect - Blood Donation Management System  Problem & Inspiration: Blood shortages are a critical global health issue, with hospitals often struggling to find compatible donors quickly. Traditional blood donation systems lack real-time connectivity between donors and those in need, leading to delayed responses during emergencies.  Solution: BloodConnect is a comprehensive web platform that bridges the gap between blood donors and recipients through real-time matching, instant communication, and intelligent donor management.  Target Users:  Blood donors looking to contribute to their community Patients and families needing urgent blood transfusions Healthcare administrators managing blood requests Medical professionals coordinating blood drives Key Features:  Smart Blood Matching: Automatic compatibility checking based on blood types and donation eligibility Real-time Messaging: Instant chat system between donors and requesters Location-based Search: Find nearby donors within specified radius Urgency Management: Priority system for critical blood requests Admin Dashboard: Comprehensive management tools for monitoring requests and users Educational Resources: Information about blood donation benefits and eligibility Donation Tracking: 90-day eligibility tracking to ensure donor safety Technical Highlights:  Built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS Local storage for demo purposes (production-ready for database integration) Responsive design optimized for all devices Real-time status indicators and notifications Comprehensive blood type compatibility matrix

projects.title: OmniVeo
projects.description: OmniVeo is the first-ever AI tutor that teaches you complex creative software by seeing your screen in real time.  We built it to solve a huge problem: powerful tools like Photoshop, Ableton, or Blender are hard to learn—and most people quit before they ever get good. Traditional tutorials are disconnected, slow, and force you to tab-switch between videos and your project.  OmniVeo changes that by combining three breakthrough features:  A conversational AI tutor who learns your learning style, pace, and skill level  Real-time screen awareness that understands what you're working on  Deep contextual knowledge of each supported software  It supports 12 tools across design, 3D, video editing, audio, and code—from Photoshop and Maya to VS Code and Cursor. Whether you're a beginner or a pro, OmniVeo adapts like a real mentor—patient, smart, and always focused on your workflow.

projects.title: Yuna Productivity Companion

I realised specialised AI agents could cover the core growth roles—if they could share context, cite internal docs, and hand off board-ready PDFs.  ⸻  Who it’s for 	•	Bootstrapped startups that can’t hire a full marketing department 	•	Agencies that want an internal ideation engine 	•	Operators who need quick research, planning, and copy without task-switching. AI Department transforms a single question—“How do we launch our product?”—into research insights, strategic positioning, persuasive copy, process checklists, and distribution ideas, all in one go, giving lean teams the firepower of a full growth department.

projects.description: STEMix is an educational initiative designed to bridge the digital and learning divide across underrepresented regions like Jammu & Kashmir by providing accessible, engaging, and personalized STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) education.  Problem it solves: Many students in remote or underserved areas lack access to high-quality STEM education, mentorship, and learning resources. STEMix addresses this gap through a blend of technology-driven learning models and localized support.  What inspired it: The vision was inspired by the need to democratize STEM learning and bring equitable opportunities to every student, regardless of geography or socio-economic background.  Who it's for: STEMix is built for K-12 students, especially in low-resource settings, along with teachers and local education stakeholders.  Key Features:  1-on-1 and small group live classes in Physics, Math, and Computer Science aligned with major boards (CBSE, IB, IGCSE, etc.)  AI-powered adaptive learning and Duolingo-style micro-learning modules  Interactive platform with gamified content and AR/VR-based simulations  Partnership-ready model to work with schools, NGOs, and edtech firms  STEM blog and resource bank to promote STEM culture and awareness  Whether it's launching foundational coding camps or advanced physics workshops, STEMix is built to scale quality education where it’s needed most.

projects.title: Magic Prompts Workflow
projects.description: 💡 Problem It Solves / Inspiration: When I started building with Bolt.new, I realized most resources focused on individual features or UI elements — but there was no clear workflow that explained when to use what, or how to chain prompts together for real outcomes.  So, I began documenting my own trial-and-error process. Over time, I refined a system that consistently produced strong Bolt builds using structured prompts, UI feedback loops, and micro-systems.  That became Magic Prompts Workflow — a resource for:  Beginners who want to build real projects faster  Prompt engineers refining their process  Bolt.new users looking to create smarter, not harder  ⚙️ Key Features: Interactive Documentation: Learn by following real-world prompt loops  Progress Tracking: See your learning status as you go  Searchable Prompt Library: Curated prompts for every stage of development  Mobile-First Design: Optimized for usability on any device  Built-in Theme Toggle + Scroll Animations for better UX  🚀 Built Entirely on Bolt.new Modular sections  Scroll-based navigation  Custom layout logic  Progress state with context provider  Clean, responsive design using Framer Motion + Tailwind CSS  Refined using a 6M+ token iterative process  ✨ Actual Prompt Used to Start the Project: “Build a structured documentation website for developers learning to build with Bolt.new. It should guide users from idea to deployment using a prompt-based development workflow. Include a homepage, progress tracker, reusable sections for each topic, and a prompt library that can be filtered. The tone should be modern, helpful, and minimal. Fully responsive, mobile-first, and clean UI.”  🔗 Live Site: https://magicprompts.netlify.app

projects.title: Pohi AI Pro
projects.description: ### **Inspiration**  The inspiration for Pohi AI Pro came directly from real-world experience in the acacia wood pole manufacturing industry. Selling these products globally highlighted significant inefficiencies and a clear need for a centralized system to connect manufacturers with ready stock to customers looking to place orders, and to streamline the complex logistics involved.  ### **What it does**  Pohi AI Pro is a sophisticated database and logistics application designed to revolutionize how manufacturers and their customers interact. At its core, it:  * **Connects Stakeholders:** It serves as a central hub for customers (buyers) to submit their product demands and for manufacturers to list their available stock.   * **Manages Orders & Stock:** The system facilitates the uploading of detailed order requirements by customers and available inventory by manufacturers. A key feature is its AI-powered capability to automatically match these demands with suitable stock.   * **Provides Role-Specific Interfaces:** It offers tailored user interfaces for three distinct roles:     * **Customers:** Can submit new demands (including specialized ones like acacia pole orders) and track their existing demands, benefiting from AI suggestions for alternatives or status explanations.     * **Manufacturers:** Can list new stock items, manage their inventory, and leverage AI tools for price suggestions, marketing text generation, product photo generation, and listing quality analysis.     * **Administrators:** Have a comprehensive overview of the platform, manage users and system-wide stock, utilize advanced AI-driven matchmaking tools, plan logistics (including truck loading and routing), handle billing, and access AI-generated reports and system health dashboards.

projects.title: CareerCraft | AI Powered Job Applications
projects.description: What problem does it solve, or what inspired you to build it? Who is it for?  CareerCraft was built to solve a frustrating but common problem: the job application process is time-consuming, repetitive, and emotionally draining. Many job seekers—especially early-career professionals and career switchers—struggle to tailor resumes and cover letters for each role, often resorting to generic content that doesn't reflect their true potential.  The inspiration came from personal experience and observing peers: talented individuals missing opportunities simply because they were overwhelmed by the application workload or unsure how to present themselves effectively.  CareerCraft is for anyone actively applying for jobs—students, recent graduates, professionals pivoting careers, and even career coaches looking for tools to help their clients. It’s designed to make personalized applications faster, smarter, and easier.  Key features & functionality:  Profile Setup: A dynamic, multi-section form for users to input personal info, work experience, education, and skills.  Job Input: Accepts job descriptions via text or URL, with automatic AI parsing.  AI-Powered Document Generation: Tailored resumes and personalized cover letters using GPT-3.5-turbo, with anti-hallucination prompt safeguards.  Live Preview & Download: Users can review content and download job-specific documents instantly.  Modern UI/UX: Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and a mobile-friendly, responsive layout.  Local-First Approach: Uses browser localStorage for fast performance and user privacy.  By combining smart prompt design, a clean interface, and fast document generation, CareerCraft helps users apply with confidence—without the burnout.

projects.title: Adifi
projects.description: Inspiration As a 15-year-old JEE aspirant, my life is built around study schedules, problem sets, and pressure. Everyone around me expects academic excellence, not creative expression. I’ve often heard:  “Coding won’t take you anywhere right now.” “Why waste time on side projects?”  But I’ve always known that I wasn’t built just to follow a syllabus. I wanted to build something that felt like mine.  Late one night, drained after coaching, I opened Bolt.New. No installs, no distractions — just an open canvas and a crazy idea:  What if photo editing could be lightning-fast, powerful like Photoshop, simple like Canva, and all in the browser?  That’s how ADIFI was born. Not just a tool, but my rebellion against rote learning and my belief that I can create something real — even when no one believes in me.  What it does Adifi(AKA photo studio pro) is a lightning-fast, privacy-first photo editor that works completely in-browser. It combines the precision of Photoshop with the simplicity of Canva, without requiring any downloads or uploads.  Features:  Multi-layer editing (images, text, effects)  Real-time filters (brightness, contrast, blur, vignette, etc.)  AI-powered background removal (using BodyPix)  Instant exports (with zero server processing)  Fully responsive UI with keyboard shortcuts and live previews  How we built it Built entirely in Bolt.New using vibe coding — described my vision and let AI scaffold the architecture.  Used React + TypeScript with Tailwind CSS for structure and styling.  Built a custom Canvas engine to handle layers, effects, and pixel manipulations.  Integrated TensorFlow.js and BodyPix for client-side AI features like background removal.  Added undo/redo functionality, image state tracking, and real-time performance stats.  Challenges we ran into Balancing studies and coding: Working on ADIFI late at night, after long coaching days, was emotionally and mentally draining.  Performance bottlenecks: Large image processing would slow the browse

projects.title: YouLookedAt.me
projects.description: A missed connection is when two people briefly cross paths, feel a possible connection, but don’t get the chance to talk further or exchange contact information.  I once had a brief interaction with a girl. We smiled at each other. I saw her again on a beach, but I wasn’t confident enough to approach her. I didn’t know her name, who her friends were, or where she studied. It was a huge city, and I knew the chances of ever seeing her again were slim unless destiny had something planned. But I wasn’t that lucky. I never saw her again.  Even now, that moment stays with me. I often wonder how two strangers who felt something could they ever find each other again. If they don’t know names, addresses, or any personal details. That question stayed with me and eventually sparked the idea for this project.  YouLookedAt.me is a platform where you can share your missed connection moment. If someone else posts a story that matches yours, you’ll be notified and can start a chat. It’s a space to share real, heartfelt stories, post anonymous notes, and maybe even reconnect with someone you briefly crossed paths with.  It’s all about second chances and real stories because sometimes destiny just needs a little help.

projects.title: Tagramp 🚀
projects.description: As a founder I attend countless pitch nights, demo days, and coffee meet-ups. By the end of each week my pockets are stuffed with business cards and my LinkedIn inbox is full of “nice to meet you” messages, but when a real problem surfaces I cannot remember which of those contacts actually fits the challenge. I wanted a tool that would treat every introduction as data, tie it to my business goals, and surface the one expert or company that can move the needle right now. Tagramp began as that personal itch: turning random networking into a goal-centric, ROI-driven engine for growth and collaboration. What it does Tagramp is an AI-first SaaS platform that converts static contact lists into living, goal-oriented opportunities.  AI profile generation I paste a website URL, PDF deck, or plain text. Natural-language models summarise the material and create a concise company or personal profile plus a short list of top-level goals.  Goal-centric matching Those goals feed an intelligent matcher that scans verified professionals and organisations—either public communities or networks I import. The algorithm scores each potential connection on relevance, complementary expertise, and past success. projects.title: TrafficIQ
projects.description: What problem does it solve, or what inspired you to build it?  TrafficIQ solves the deadly crisis of unpredictable traffic congestion that costs lives, time, and trillions globally. I was inspired to build it after personally falling asleep in Lagos traffic and witnessing a patient die in an ambulance during the catastrophic Independence Bridge gridlock where people were trapped for 48+ hours - I realized we can predict weather and stock markets but people still drive blind into traffic disasters that kill and cost the global economy over $1 trillion annually.  Who is it for?  TrafficIQ is for daily commuters losing hours to traffic (like Lagos residents who lose 2 months yearly), emergency services needing life-saving priority routing, city governments requiring smart traffic management, logistics companies optimizing deliveries, and anyone who believes no one should die in traffic because we couldn't predict the predictable.  Key features, functionality, or integrations:  TrafficIQ provides 24-hour traffic predictions (world's first), emergency vehicle priority routing with dynamic corridors, AI-powered congestion hotspot identification, real-time alternative routes, and city-wide impact tracking that reduces commute times by 30-40%, built with Bolt.new for rapid development, Together AI for prediction algorithms, Supabase for real-time data, Google Maps API for traffic data, and deployed on Netlify - achieving 85% prediction accuracy and proving its worth by saving my 2-hour commute this morning!

projects.title: IELTS Achiever
projects.description: Each year, over 4 million IELTS tests are taken globally, yet there are remarkably few platforms that offer a unified, highly accurate mock testing experience. The motivation behind IELTS Achiever was to bridge this gap—providing candidates with a single destination where they can practice all four IELTS modules in a manner that closely mirrors the official exam environment. The vision was to create a solution that not only replicates the structure and rigor of the real test, but also harnesses AI to deliver dynamic, personalized, and insightful preparation.  What it does IELTS Achiever allows students to immerse themselves in a comprehensive mock test experience. The platform covers Listening, Reading, and Writing sections, with a Speaking module featuring a real-time avatar coming soon. Every test is dynamically generated by AI, ensuring fresh, relevant, and challenging content for each user. Automated AI evaluation provides immediate, detailed feedback, empowering students to identify strengths and target areas for improvement. The approach is designed to make preparation both effective and engaging, while maintaining the authenticity of the actual IELTS exam.

projects.title: Boarding school attendance app
projects.description: The idea for this app came directly from real-life experience. I work at a welfare boarding school, where tracking students' arrivals and departures is a constant challenge. Without a proper system, it's easy to lose sight of who's in, who's out, and who might be missing – and that lack of oversight can be critical.  Just two weeks ago, I discovered Bolt, a powerful no-code platform. I had never built anything with it before, but I decided to take on the challenge and create a real solution. I was honestly amazed at how intuitive and smart Bolt was – sometimes it even understood my needs better than I could explain them!  I learned a lot during the process: new development terms, UI/UX logic, how to build live dashboards, manage user roles, create smart alerts, and set up powerful automations and external integrations. I published the app using Netlify, and although I tried to connect a personal domain via ENTRI, I ran into technical issues – which became a valuable part of the learning journey.  Now, I'm proud not only of the app, but of the entire process – turning a real need into a smart, automated solution that supports staff, protects students, and opens the door to even more innovation ahead.

projects.title: SKILLSYNC
projects.description: ### **SkillSync – The AI-Powered Career Copilot for Students**    **Problem Solved:** Students and early-career professionals struggle to navigate the overwhelming world of upskilling, internships, and side gigs. Traditional platforms offer fragmented solutions, leaving users to manually hunt for resources, opportunities, and communities.    **Inspiration:** Seeing talented learners waste time searching for the *right* courses, hackathons, or mentors—instead of actually building skills—inspired SkillSync. It’s the tool I wish I had in college!    **For:**   - **Students** seeking internships, hackathons, or skill roadmaps.   - **Self-taught learners** who want curated resources (no more "Which Python course is best?").   - **Freelancers** looking for gigs while upskilling.    **Key Features:**   1. **AI Skill Mapper:** Generates personalized roadmaps with **LinkedIn role models, GitHub repos, Discord communities, and top-rated courses/videos**. *(Example prompt: "I know Python basics—show me open-source projects, free advanced courses, and local hackathons.")*   2. **Internship/Job Aggregator:** Pulls real-time listings from **LinkedIn, Wellfound, and Internshala APIs**.   3. **Hackathon & Freelance Hub:** Tracks global competitions and gigs (e.g., Devpost, Fiverr).   4. **Bias-Resistant:** Focuses on skills, not pedigree.    **Tech Highlights:**   - **AI-Powered:** NLP to match skills (e.g., "Django" ↔ "Backend Development").   - **Live Integrations:** GitHub API for trending repos, Reddit/Discord scrapers for communities.   - **Roadmap.sh-style Visuals:** Interactive skill paths.    **One-Sentence Pitch:**   *"SkillSync is the ChatGPT meets LinkedIn for students—turning ‘How do I start?’ into a step-by-step playbook with AI-curated resources, opportunities, and communities."*    ---   **Why It Works:** It replaces 10+ tabs (Coursera + Reddit + GitHub + Discord) with **one AI-driven command**. 🚀

projects.title: PurpleVerse
projects.description: 💡What problem does it solve, or what inspired you to build it? Who is it for?  PurpleVerse was inspired by the frustrating limitations people in low-income countries face when shopping online — especially when it comes to international payments, FOREX instability, and platform restrictions. Traditional e-commerce is often inaccessible or expensive for users in these regions, and that creates a digital divide in global trade.  I wanted to solve this by creating a borderless e-commerce platform that leverages crypto (USDC on Algorand Testnet for the prototype) as the means of payment. This removes the need for traditional financial systems and enables secure, trustless transactions worldwide — even for physical goods.  PurpleVerse is for:  Buyers who want to shop globally without payment restrictions.  Sellers looking to reach wider markets and access intelligent tools.  Emerging markets underserved by mainstream payment systems.   🔑 Key Features & Functionality  Crypto-Powered Payments Secure, escrow-based crypto transactions using USDC on Algorand. Funds are held until buyers confirm delivery.  Mock Wallet Integration For demo purposes, a hardcoded mock wallet simulates crypto payments and release flows.  AI-Assisted Seller Tools Sellers get help writing product descriptions, tracking analytics, and managing inventory through AI-powered features.  Admin Dashboard Full control panel to manage users, roles, featured products, commissions, and blog content.  Flash Sales & Featured Listings Sellers can run time-limited offers or pay to boost product visibility across the platform.  Platform Revenue Model 5% commission on every sale + featured product placement fees, all automated.  Blog and AI Chatbot (Support) Includes a built-in blog CMS and AI chatbot to assist buyers and sellers with FAQs and navigation.   🔌 Built With:  Frontend: React + TypeScript + Tailwind + Vite  Backend: Supabase (auth, DB, storage, functions, RLS)  Blockchain: Algorand (Testnet) using algo

projects.title: Lovelette
projects.description: What inspired me to build it? This project comes from a deeply personal place - writing a heartfelt letter literally saved my marriage. When my relationship was at its lowest point, I sat down and poured my heart out in a letter to my partner. That single act of vulnerable, thoughtful communication changed everything for us. I realized that if a letter could transform my relationship, imagine what it could do for others. Who is it for? Lovelette is for anyone who wants to reconnect with loved ones on a deeper level - couples looking to strengthen their relationships, friends who want to express gratitude, family members bridging distances, or anyone who believes in the power of words to heal and connect. Key features include: Beautiful, customizable letter templates Secure delivery system built on Supabase Resend integration for seamless email delivery User authentication and personal letter management Responsive design for writing on any device This isn't just another messaging app - it's a tool for creating moments that matter, relationships that last, and connections that truly count.

It's not about building software — it's about launching opportunities.

projects.title: Flowstake - Fitness Tracking
projects.description: FlowStake is a decentralized fitness platform that allows users to bet on themselves by staking cryptocurrency on the successful completion of physical challenges—like running a 5K or walking 10,000 steps a day. It solves the problem of fitness motivation by adding a real financial and social incentive tied to verified activity.  Inspired by the rise of Proof of Work and Move-to-Earn systems, FlowStake is built for athletes, health-conscious individuals, and communities who want to gamify fitness with verifiable blockchain rewards. Users connect wearables or fitness platforms like Strava, verify activity through GPS, QR codes, or peer attestations, and earn crypto (FST, ETH, or USDC) for completing their goals.  Key Features:  Smart Contract Staking on Ethereum or Base  Proof of Activity via GPS, wearables, or P2P attestation (photo, NFC, QR)  Strava integration (OAuth + Webhook)  Real-time Verification and IPFS-backed data storage  Challenge Types: Solo, Group, Relay, Checkpoint, Time-based  Reward Engine with configurable prize splits and NFT achievements  Built using Supabase, IPFS, and Ethers.js  Prompt: Build a tool that uses on-chain logic to verify off-chain actions and ties real-world behavior to crypto incentives.  FlowStake bridges the gap between health and crypto—making fitness both fun and financially rewarding.

projects.title: renat.ai
projects.description: The renat.ai project was inspired by the vision of creating an advanced artificial general intelligence (AGI) assistant that can effectively help users with a wide range of tasks. The core problem it aims to solve is providing an intelligent, secure, and user-friendly conversational AI experience, moving beyond basic chatbots to offer deeper knowledge and assistance. It's built to showcase the potential of integrating powerful AI models with robust, modern web technologies.  This project is primarily for users seeking an intelligent conversational partner for various inquiries, from technology and science to general assistance. It's also a valuable resource for developers and AI enthusiasts interested in how a full-stack AI application can be built with a focus on security, performance, and user experience.  Here are some of its key features, functionalities, and integrations:  Advanced AI Integration: At its heart, renat.ai integrates with the OpenAI API to provide sophisticated chat capabilities, allowing it to understand and respond to complex queries. Secure Authentication and Database: It uses Supabase for robust user authentication and as its PostgreSQL database, ensuring secure user management and persistent storage of chat messages. Comprehensive Security Measures: Security is a paramount concern, with features like: Content Security Policy (CSP) configured in netlify.toml to prevent cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks. Input Validation and Rate Limiting (src/lib/security.ts) to protect against abuse and ensure data integrity. Secure Headers (HSTS, X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options, X-XSS-Protection) for enhanced browser security. Secure Logging (src/lib/logger.ts) for monitoring security events and authentication attempts. Modern Frontend Development: The application is built with React and TypeScript, styled with Tailwind CSS for a responsive and visually appealing interface, and uses Lucide React for a consistent icon set. Dynamic User Experience: It

The name "Safii" comes from a Hindi word "Safaii" meaning cleanliness and it reflects a civic movement powered by everyday people.

projects.title: HotDog Training App
projects.description: Life with a reactive dog is chaotic. HotDog helps make it manageable.  From leash reactivity to muzzle training—or just building better habits—HotDog gives you simple tools to stay consistent, track meaningful progress, and log each training session effortlessly.   Track what matters: - Set goals that actually make sense for your dog - Log triggers, wins, and other factors affecting training - Record quick audio logs and get AI-generated summaries - Share your dog’s journey with trainers, vets, or family - Look back and say: “Wow, we’ve come a long way.”  No guesswork or perfect pups required.   Just structure, reflection, and support—so you can keep showing up, even on the tough days. Created using Expo, RevenueCat, Supabase, Google Gemini API (with the Vercel AI SDK), and of course bolt.new! Every seller’s profile is reviewed by hand before going live; buyers fund projects through Stripe-backed escrow, and both parties collaborate inside a shared project room that bundles chat, milestones and deliverables. Behind the scenes Devdash runs on a Supabase Postgres database (with pgvector for similarity search) and OpenAI for embeddings and function-calling, while Resend handles transactional email. The result is a focused, trustworthy space where clients find the right website professional on the first try and freelancers finally get leads tailored to their craft.

projects.title: Flights Overhead
projects.description: What Inspired Me I flew from San Diego to Seattle, then Seattle to Victoria, BC yesterday for a vacation! As I approached each airport, I found myself watching planes take off and land, and wondered: Where are they going? Where did they come from?  That same curiosity often strikes me at home - I live below a flight path and constantly hear aircraft flying overhead. I wanted a tool that could tell me, in real-time, where those planes are headed or returning from. This app is the result of that moment of curiosity.  What I Learned This was my first time working with both the Mapbox Geocoding API and the FlightAware AeroAPI, and I’m thrilled with how much I’ve expanded my understanding of live geospatial APIs.  I also gained hands-on experience with Supabase Edge Functions, which helped me improve my error handling, environment variable management, and middleware API routing.  How I Built It The entire application was structured from one comprehensive Bolt prompt that included:  Geolocation and address-based input Mapbox Geocoding to turn addresses into coordinates FlightAware to fetch live nearby flights and calculate the closest one Supabase Edge Function to handle secure API calls React + Tailwind + open-source fonts for a responsive, vintage-style frontend Mobile-first layout with full accessibility, loading states, and error handling Every piece of functionality and design was planned in that initial Bolt prompt. Follow-up prompts were used only for fixing Supabase edge function errors and polishing output.

Built by a father-sons developer team who experienced these problems firsthand, we're daily users solving our own real frustrations.  The result? Stronger friendships through clearer communication. Unlike regular scheduling apps, Day-2-Day integrates your full schedule with your personal life. You don't just have a list of to-dos; what you have is a personalized priority schedule. A few key features 👉  👉 For new users, Day-2-Day begins with an interactive and easy onboarding process where you’ll smoothly enter preset activities — including usual daily activities (like breakfast and brushing), preset schedules (like school or work), hobbies, habits you're building, and personal projects you’re working on, etc — all through a simple, selectable and adjustable interface. Just quick taps or edits to input frequencies, durations, commute, and as much detail as possible. Yes! Your assistant takes these details into consideration when helping you plan for the day.  📝 As life goes on, add new to-dos for the current day or days ahead.  📅 Hit the “Generate Smart Schedule” button, and your assistant creates a suggested plan for the day, based on preset activities (or recurring tasks) and specific to-dos. You can move, edit, delete, and add blocks (activities on your schedule) to suit you.  ⚡ On the move? The Quick Add feature lets you drop in tasks without slowing down.  📈 Track your progress with: ✅ A habit tracker (see streaks and completion), 🎯 Task progress over time, 🌤 Daily mood check-ins, and more.  This is your tool if you're looking for organization and focus!

projects.description: doHockey is the smart assistant for field hockey coaches. From drag-and-drop lineups to automatic substitution schedules and real-time playtime tracking, it simplifies match-day management. Stay focused on the game—doHockey handles the logistics.  ##Why doHockey? As an amateur field hockey coach, I know how much time and effort goes into managing a team — especially on busy weekends. Planning lineups, tracking playtime, and organizing substitutions often takes more time than the match itself. That’s why I developed doHockey: a practical, time-saving tool designed to take the hassle out of match-day management.  doHockey helps coaches stay focused on the game by handling the logistics. You can easily create lineups with a drag-and-drop interface, automatically generate substitution schedules based on preset intervals, and track each player’s playtime in real time. Whether you want to rotate players every 6 or 9 minutes, or ensure fair playing time for everyone, doHockey makes it simple.  The tool supports standard match settings — four quarters of 17.5 minutes, with up to five reserves — and provides a live dashboard during the match, along with a printable substitution schedule to keep things running smoothly on the sidelines.  doHockey is built for coaches like me, who love the sport but could use a bit of help staying organized. It saves time, reduces stress, and ensures every player gets the attention they deserve.  Inspiration  As an amateur field hockey coach, I often spend more time planning than coaching. Organizing lineups, substitutions, and tracking playtime — especially during weekend matches — can be stressful and inefficient. I wanted a tool to take care of the logistics so I could focus on the team and the game.

projects.title: Synclinic
projects.description: The inspiration for Synclinic came from witnessing the struggle patients and doctors face in accessing and managing quality healthcare—especially in regions where resources are limited. Too often, patients must wait days for basic advice, and doctors are overloaded with manual tasks. I wanted to build a platform that truly bridges this gap, making healthcare more accessible, efficient, and community-driven.  Who is it for?  Synclinic is built for both patients and doctors.  Patients benefit from instant access to an AI-powered medical assistant, Agatha Christine, who provides personalized health tips, preliminary assessments, and support 24/7.  Doctors get a secure, intuitive dashboard to manage patient records, send prescriptions, update health information, and communicate easily—all while maintaining the highest standards of privacy.  Key Features & Integrations:  AI Assistant (Agatha Christine): Doctors can train and update the AI for improved and safe analysis. Patients get tailored recommendations and fast answers.  Community Experience: Patients can share their health journeys, support each other, and learn from collective experiences—vital in countries where hospitals are scarce.  Doctor & Patient Dashboards: Secure record-keeping, real-time messaging, appointment management, and more.  Pandemic-ready: Enables remote triage, care, and support during health crises.  Integrations: Built on Supabase for secure storage & authentication, OpenAI for smart AI chat, and ElevenLabs for natural voice interactions.
